about_the_game:
Play VALKKRYES : Ashes Of War ,
Your tribe has suffered a devastating attack - the elders were killed, the lands and orchards burned to ashes, and many of your brothers were kidnapped by the perpetrators. But amidst the chaos, a hero emerged - you.

Determined to save your kidnapped brothers and seek revenge against the savage leaders who wronged your tribe, you set out on a quest armed with all the necessary equipment. You'll need to navigate through seven cursed lands, filled with terrifying dungeons, dark caves, and monstrous creatures.

Along the way, you'll gather supplies, set traps, and recruit reinforcements as you make your way towards strategic locations and key guards. You'll also have the opportunity to find rare power-ups to help you take on giant monsters and extract energy from your enemies.

As you fight your way through the battlefields, use your arsenal of weapons - including axes, swords, slinging hammers, and hunting machetes - to defeat the rebels and oppressors who stand in your way.

Experience a unique fantasy world filled with action, adventure, and power in VALKKRYES. Suitable for players of all ages and groups, this game promises to transport you to a new realm of excitement

name: VALKKRYES : Ashes Of War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 10240.0 or higher
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 10240.0 or higher
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
